Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews read reviews glad ignored negative reviews hotel unbelievable people picky simply met friendly night porter checked told stairs lead believe steep castle steps theyre steep dont floor greeted pleasant twin albeit comfortable en suite safe fridge fantastic doesnt happen useful read reviews hotel re conveniences absolute rubbish hotel road sainsburys pubs restaurants shops whoever wrote obviously left hotel instead beds comfortable extra pillow convenience paid price 2 nights earls court value money breakfast continental juice coffee cornflakes toast cheese boiled eggs people questioned boiled eggs review plenty times hotels youre planning days maybe own stuff toast cant supply fridges stop moaning pleasant stay hesitate oh remote control bed trundle 30cm tv switch channels remote deposit safe pocket sort nerves location hotel value fair mind prove wrong

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and cheap”
Reviews.Author: foard83
Reviews.Content: hey booked double january 2012 bookingcom cost friday night booked moving home night cheapest value money bed comfortable clean shower plasma tv freeview breakfast juice buffet style included negative slightly cold didnt heat maybe remedied recommend looking nice budget hotel location london

Reviews.Title: “Do you like dirty rooms and rude service? That's your place!”
Reviews.Author: brucewayneit
Reviews.Content: book bookingcom nice conveniently close earls court tube station soon arrived help luggage dirty stinky guy reception shown worse hotel walls written dirty bed linen stained stinky carpet immediately wife shared move asap despite loose paid money decide else yourself favor run

Reviews.Title: “Good value”

Reviews.Content: pleased arrival gentleman reception honoured request minimum stairs allocated ground floor bathroom perfectly clean bathroom looking recently refurbished beds comfortable towels provided unexpectedly qualitythe bathroom perfectly adequate breakfast reviews read hotel basic entirely satisfactory bread provided fresh cheapest available toaster wasnt day price paid 2 night stay visit international horse olympia excellent value money
